item.title: 苹果再失一名大将：液态玻璃负责人被 Meta 挖角
item.guid: 苹果再失一名大将：液态玻璃负责人被-Meta-挖角
item.description:
Early this morning, Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman revealed that Apple's VP of Human Interface Design, Alan Dye, has been poached by Meta. 今天凌晨，彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 发文透露，苹果人机交互设计副总裁 Alan Dye 被 Meta 挖角。

It is reported that Dye has been the head of Apple's user interface design team since 2015. After being poached this time, Apple will replace Dye with long-time designer Stephen Lemay. 据悉， Dye 自 2015 年以来，一直担任苹果的用户界面设计团队的负责人。 而本次被挖角后，苹果将用长期设计师 Stephen Lemay 顶替 Dye 的岗位。

It is worth mentioning that Dye was responsible for overseeing iOS 26, liquid glass interface, Vision Pro interface, watchOS, and various system interaction level content (such as spatial computing interaction, Dynamic Island). 值得一提的是， Dye 曾负责监督 iOS 26、液态玻璃界面、Vision Pro 界面、watchOS，以及各种系统交互层面内容（如空间计算交互、灵动岛）。

The report points out that after Jobs' departure, Dye played an important role: helping the company define the appearance of the latest operating systems, apps, and devices. In addition, Dye's team at Apple also helped develop a series of new smart home devices. 报道指出，Dye 在乔布斯离开后，一直担任着重要角色：帮助公司定义了最新操作系统、App 以及设备的外观。另外，Dye 在苹果的团队也帮助开发一系列新的智能家居设备。

On Meta's side, with Dye joining, the company is establishing a new design studio, and Dye will be responsible for interface design in hardware, software, and AI integration. Meta 方面，随着 Dye 加入，该公司正在创立一个新的设计工作室，并且有 Dye 负责硬件、软件和 AI 集成方面的界面设计。

Dye will report to Andrew Bosworth, CTO of Reality Labs, which is responsible for developing wearable devices such as smart glasses and virtual reality headsets. Gurman revealed that Dye will officially begin his role as Chief Design Officer for the team on December 31. Dye 将向负责现实实验室的首席技术官 Andrew Bosworth 汇报工作，而现实实验室负责开发可穿戴设备，如智能眼镜和虚拟现实头戴式设备。Gurman 透露，Dye 将于 12 月 31 日正式开始担任团队首席设计官。

item.title: 最低 1699 元，理想 AI 眼镜 Livis 正式发布
item.guid: 最低-1699-元，理想-AI-眼镜-Livis-正式发布
item.description:
Last night, Li Auto officially released its first AI glasses product, Livis. Let's look at the price first: 昨晚，理想汽车正式发布了其首款 AI 眼镜产品 Livis，先看售价：

The starting price is set at 1999 yuan, and users who place an order before December 31 can also enjoy a 15% limited-time subsidy, bringing the final price down to just 1699 yuan.

The version with prescription lenses starts at 2199 yuan, and after the subsidy, it can be as low as 1869 yuan.

Most notably, Li Auto has partnered with Zeiss as a strategic partner this time, not only ensuring the basic quality of optics but, more importantly, streamlining the service chain. 最值得一提的是，理想这次拉来了蔡司作为战略合作伙伴，不仅保证了光学的基本素质，更关键的是打通了服务链路。

The starting price of 1999 yuan directly includes Zeiss anti-blue light resin lenses as standard; if users need outdoor sunglasses or more advanced Zeiss photochromic lenses, they only need to add a few hundred yuan to upgrade. 1999 元的起售价直接标配了蔡司防蓝光树脂镜片；如果用户需要户外墨镜或者更高级的蔡司感光变色镜片，只需要再加几百元就能升级。

Even for complex myopia/astigmatism customization, the official claim is that glasses can be completed and shipped as fast as the same day. They also offer Li Auto custom Zeiss lenses and Li Auto custom Zeiss Superb lenses (freeform surface + DuraVision Platinum coating). 即便是复杂的近视/散光定制，官方也号称最快当天就能完成配镜并发货。并且提供理想定制版蔡司镜片以及理想定制版蔡司 Superb 镜片（自由曲面+钻立方铂金膜）。

Regarding the glasses, the entire device weighs only 36g and uses Swiss EMS's TR90 medical-grade material; the temple distance is set at 137mm, with a 15° outward flip space reserved at the hinge. 眼镜方面，整机重量仅 36g，采用瑞士 EMS 的 TR90 医疗级材料；镜腿间距被设定在 137mm，转轴处预留了 15° 的外翻空间。

In terms of intelligence, Livis is equipped with the Hengxuan BES 2800 computing platform, integrated with the MindGPT-4o multimodal large model (with a voice Q&A accuracy rate of 88%). It can wake up 'Li Auto Assistant' in as fast as 0.3s and engage in dialogue in 0.8s. It also supports features like Deep Research and can link with Li Auto vehicles. 智能化方面，Livis 配备恒玄 BES 2800 计算平台，接入 MindGPT-4o 多模态大模型（语音问答准确率达 88%），最快 0.3s 可以唤醒理想同学，0.8s 进行对话。同时还支持 Deep Research 等功能，还能与理想汽车联动。

For audio and video, Livis features open-type dual-magnetic circuit sandwich speakers and incorporates inverse sound field cancellation technology; for photography, Livis is equipped with a 12-megapixel lens, supports 0.7-second quick shots and Live Photo, and can record video content with spatial audio in conjunction with a 4-microphone array. 影音方面，Livis 配备开放式的双磁路三明治扬声器，并加入了逆声场抵消技术；拍摄方面，Livis 搭载一枚 1200 万像素镜头，支持 0.7 秒快拍和 Live Photo 实况照片，并能配合 4 麦克风阵列，录制带空间音频的视频内容。

item.title: 豆包手机助手无法登录微信，双方回应
item.guid: 豆包手机助手无法登录微信，双方回应
item.description:
Recently, after ByteDance's Doubao team collaborated with ZTE to release the technical preview of Doubao Mobile Assistant, some users testing the Nubia M153 engineering prototype reported issues with being unable to log in to WeChat normally. 日前，字节跳动豆包团队与中兴合作发布了豆包手机助手技术预览版后，有试用 Nubia M153 工程样机的用户反馈，出现无法正常登陆微信的情况。

Regarding the situation, the Doubao team posted an article last night and responded. 对于相关情况，豆包团队方面昨晚发文并做出回应。

Doubao stated that it has subsequently removed the mobile assistant's ability to operate WeChat. Currently, WeChat accounts that were prohibited from logging in on the Nubia M153 are being unblocked in batches. 豆包方面表示， 其后续已下线了手机助手操作微信的能力。 目前，nubia M153 上被禁止登录的微信账号正陆续解封。

Relevant WeChat personnel also responded via The Paper, stating that WeChat had not taken any special action regarding Doubao Mobile Assistant's inability to log in normally, and that 'it might have triggered existing security risk control measures.' 而微信相关人士也通过澎湃新闻回应，豆包手机助手无法正常登陆微信的微信并没有什么特别动作，「可能是中了本来就有的安全风控措施。」

Regarding previous revelations by a tech company that 'Doubao Mobile Assistant infringes on user privacy,' the team emphasized that Doubao Mobile Assistant does not engage in any hacking activities. 针对此前曾有科技公司爆料「豆包手机助手存在侵犯用户隐私」的问题，团队方面强调，豆包手机助手不存在任何黑客行为。

It is understood that the aforementioned company previously stated that Doubao Mobile Assistant has the INJECT_EVENTS permission on Nubia phones, which is defined as a high-risk operating system permission in Android permission definitions, and obtaining this permission could lead to criminal liability. 据悉，此前上述公司曾表示豆包手机助手在努比亚手机上拥有 INJECT_EVENTS 权限，该权限在安卓权限定义中属于操作系统高危权限，并且拿到该权限，要面临刑事责任。

Doubao stated that INJECT_EVENTS is indeed a system-level permission, but with this permission, relevant products can simulate click events across screens and applications to fulfill user tasks for operating the phone. 豆包方面表示， INJECT_EVENTS 确实是系统级权限，但拥有了该权限许可，相关产品才能跨屏、跨应用来模拟点击事件，完成用户操作手机的任务需求。

The team also emphasized that Doubao Mobile Assistant requires explicit user authorization to invoke this permission and use the phone operation function. The use of this permission has also been clearly disclosed by Doubao in the permission manifest. It is understood that current AI assistants in the industry all require this permission (or similar accessibility permissions) to provide phone operation services. 团队还强调，豆包手机助手需要用户主动授权，才可以调用该权限，使用操作手机功能。 该权限的使用，豆包方面也在权限清单中进行了明确的披露。 据了解，目前行业的 AI 助手，均需要使用该权限（或与其类似的无障碍权限）才能提供操作手机的服务。

Doubao strongly stated that Doubao Mobile Assistant will not perform relevant authorizations or sensitive operations on behalf of users. 豆包方面强烈表示， 豆包手机助手也不会代替用户进行相关授权和敏感操作。

At the same time, Doubao also responded to the privacy issue of reading the screen. It stated that the assistant needs to read the screen when operating the phone (otherwise the task cannot be completed), but neither the screen content nor the operation process will be stored on the server side, and all related content will not be used for model training, ensuring user privacy and security. 同时，豆包方面也对读取屏幕的隐私问题进行了回应。其表示，助手操作手机时需要读取屏幕（否则无法完成任务），但屏幕和操作过程都不会在服务器端留下存储，且所有的相关内容也都不会进入模型训练，确保用户隐私安全。

Additionally, Li Liang, Vice President of Douyin Group, also posted a response last night, stating that he believes there is no privacy infringement as long as it is with user permission. 另外，抖音集团副总裁李亮也在昨晚发文回应，其认为只要是用户许可就不存在侵犯隐私的行为。

Li Liang stated that Doubao Mobile Assistant can only complete phone operation tasks with user authorization, and the use of all permissions is clearly disclosed in the official website's privacy and security white paper. There are no 'intrusion,' 'overstepping authority,' or other behaviors as rumored. 李亮表示，豆包手机助手是经过用户授权，才能完成操作手机的任务，所有权限的使用在官网的隐私安全白皮书中都有明确的披露，并不存在一些谣言所说的「入侵」、「越权」等行为。

Li Liang also emphasized that the Doubao Mobile Assistant technical preview is still an exploratory product, not aimed at ordinary consumers, and complies with high industry standards for compliance. 同时李亮也强调， 豆包手机助手技术预览版还是探索性产品，并不面向普通消费者，也遵守了行业高标准的合规要求。

item.title: OPPO Pocket 项目由刘作虎亲自带队
item.guid: OPPO-Pocket-项目由刘作虎亲自带队
item.description:
According to Jingxi, OPPO's Pocket project is personally led by Liu Zuohu, Chief Product Officer and Senior Vice President. 据鲸犀消息，OPPO 的 Pocket 项目由首席产品官、高级副总裁刘作虎亲自带队。

The report revealed that in terms of team configuration, OPPO has assembled a high-spec R&D team, attempting to migrate the technical advantages accumulated in the field of mobile imaging, such as computing power chips and photosensitive chips, to the Pocket project. 报道透露，在团队配置上， OPPO 组建了高规格的研发团队，试图将手机影像领域积累的算力芯片、光感芯片等技术优势，迁移到 Pocket 项目中。

In terms of technical path, OPPO chose to enter from the Pocket category, rather than directly challenging the panoramic track where Insta360 excels. The report pointed out that this direction not only avoids the opponent's advantageous areas but also fully leverages OPPO's own technical accumulation in mobile imaging. 技术路径方面，OPPO 选择从 Pocket 品类切入，而非直接挑战影石擅长的全景赛道。报道指出，该方向既避开了对手的优势领域，又能充分发挥自身在移动影像方面的技术积累。

Insiders revealed that Liu Zuohu is a key general for OPPO, and he is tasked with fighting the toughest battles. 知情人士透露，刘作虎是 OPPO 的大将，难打的仗都让他来打。

It is reported that DJI Pocket cameras have sold approximately 10 million units globally, and DJI's total revenue from several major handheld products is expected to exceed 50 billion yuan in 2025. 据悉，大疆 Pocket 相机全球销量约 1000 万台，2025 年大疆几大手持类产品总营收预计将突破 500 亿元。

The report also mentioned that facing the growth bottleneck in the mobile phone market, phone manufacturers need to find new growth points. The handheld imaging track not only has a sufficiently large market size but also has natural synergistic effects with mobile phone imaging technology, making it the most ideal breakthrough. 报道还提到，面对手机市场的增长瓶颈，手机厂商需要寻找新的增长点。手持影像赛道不仅市场规模足够大，更与手机影像技术具有天然协同效应，成为最理想的突破口。

item.title: 英伟达高管回应公司在 AI 竞赛中失去领先地位：绝对没有
item.guid: 英伟达高管回应公司在-AI-竞赛中失去领先地位：绝对没有
item.description:
According to AXIOS, NVIDIA CFO Colette Kress recently responded to the topic of "competitors catching up with NVIDIA in AI computing power," stating: 据 AXIOS 报道，英伟达首席财务官 Colette Kress 日前回应了「竞争对手正在 AI 算力领域赶超英伟达」的话题，其表示：

The company has absolutely not lost its leading position (in the AI race), and everyone is using our platform. Meanwhile, the global economy is still in the "early stages" of transitioning to data center infrastructure needed to support AI.

Kress also reiterated that NVIDIA expects global investment in AI to reach between $3 trillion and $4 trillion by the end of this decade. 同时 Kress 还重申，英伟达预计到本十年末，全球在 AI 领域的投资总额将达到 3 万亿至 4 万亿美元。

Recently, The Information reported that Google has begun pitching a plan to deploy TPUs in its own data centers to some customers. This means Google is accelerating the expansion of its AI chip business, directly challenging NVIDIA's dominance in the field. 近期，The Information 报道表示，Google 已开始向部分客户推销在其自有数据中心部署 TPU 的方案。这意味着 Google 正在加快人工智能芯片业务的扩张步伐，直接挑战英伟达在该领域的主导地位。

NVIDIA subsequently responded positively to the news, stating that it was pleased with Google's success, "They have made great progress in AI, and we continue to supply Google." 随后英伟达正面回应了相关消息，称其对 Google 的成功感到高兴，「他们在人工智能领域取得了巨大进步，我们继续向谷歌供货。」

NVIDIA also emphasized that its technology is a generation ahead of the industry, and its AI chips are the only platform capable of running all AI models and operating in any computing environment. 英伟达还强调，自己的技术领先行业一代，其 AI 芯片是唯一能够运行所有人工智能模型并在任何计算场所运行的平台。

Additionally, Kress revealed that NVIDIA's recently announced investment plan of up to $100 billion in ChatGPT developer OpenAI has not yet been finalized. "We have not reached a binding agreement, but we are still working with them." 另外，Kress 还透露，英伟达近期宣布的对 ChatGPT 开发商 OpenAI 高达 1000 亿美元的投资计划尚未最终敲定。「我们尚未达成具有约束力的协议，但仍在与他们合作。」

item.title: 前大疆植保无人机开创者创业智能房车
item.guid: 前大疆植保无人机开创者创业智能房车
item.description:
According to Jingxi, LeYi Intelligent (LAYEE), founded by Wu Xumin (internally known as MG), the pioneer of DJI's agricultural plant protection drone business line, has completed its angel round financing, led by Hillhouse Capital, with seed round investor Chuxin Capital making an over-allotment, pushing its valuation past 300 million RMB. 据鲸犀报道，由前大疆农业植保机事业线开创者吴旭民（内部常称 MG）创立的乐逸智能（LAYEE），已完成天使轮融资，由高瓴创投领投，种子轮投资人初心资本超额加投，估值突破 3 亿人民币。

It is reported that LeYi, founded in 2025, is a technology company focused on smart towable RVs. 据悉，乐逸成立于 2025 年，是一家专注于智能拖挂式房车的科技公司。

Wu Xumin is one of the few senior product managers within DJI who has operated and extended three major product strategic directions: plant protection, industrial, and action cameras. He is also the only person at DJI to have a product named after his product manager alias (MG). Wu Xumin has created over 10 popular products, and the product lines he was responsible for generated over 40 billion in revenue. 而吴旭民是大疆内部少有曾操盘并延伸出植保、行业、运动相机三大产品战略方向的大产品经理，也是大疆唯一以其产品经理名字（MG）命名产品的负责人。吴旭民曾打造过 10+ 款爆款产品，负责的产品线收入超 400 亿。

It is worth noting that LeYi Intelligent boasts a strong team lineup, including several senior former DJI technical and marketing executives such as the former head of DJI's plant protection drones, Robomaster structural director, former DJI hardware director, and DJI's overseas sales head. Currently, about 50% of the team members come from top drone companies like DJI. 值得关注的是，乐逸智能团队阵容豪华，包括前大疆植保机总体负责人、Robomaster 结构主管、原大疆硬件主管、大疆海外销售负责人等多位资深前大疆技术和市场高管已经加盟，目前团队约 50% 成员源自大疆等顶尖无人机企业。

The other approximately 50% of the members come from mainstream automotive giants like Ford, specializing in vehicle safety engineering, reliable manufacturing, and chassis technology. 另外约 50% 成员来自福特等主流汽车大厂，专注车辆安全工程、可靠性制造与底盘技术。

Informed investors revealed that the LeYi team possesses top-tier capabilities in forward R&D and product definition for complex hardware systems, as well as a repeatedly proven efficiency in creating hit products. 知情投资人士透露，乐逸团队拥有顶尖的复杂硬件系统正向研发和产品定义能力，以及已被多次验证的爆品打造效率。

Currently, LeYee Intelligent's first product has completed multiple rounds of iterative trial production. This round of financing will accelerate the company's pace in creating a new generation of intelligent, user-friendly, and comfortable smart mobile spaces. 目前，目前，乐逸智能的首款产品完成多轮迭代试制。本轮融资将加速公司打造新一代智能、易用、舒适的智能移动空间的步伐。

item.title: 擎天柱跑起来，马斯克展示特斯拉机器人奔跑
item.guid: 擎天柱跑起来，马斯克展示特斯拉机器人奔跑
item.description:
Yesterday, Tesla Optimus unveiled its latest humanoid robot research achievement – the robot running. Elon Musk subsequently reposted the relevant video content. 昨日，特斯拉 Optimus 公布了其人形机器人最新研发成果——机器人奔跑。随后马斯克更是转发了相关视频内容。

From the released video, Optimus's running posture is very natural, with smooth arm swings and strides. It's worth noting that the Optimus demonstrated has a golden body, and according to Musk's previous statements, this demonstration might be of the 2.5 version of Optimus. 从公布的视频来看，跑步的 Optimus 姿态十分自然，整体摆臂以及步伐都较为顺畅。值得关注的是，展示的 Optimus 为金色机身，以马斯克此前消息，本次展示的或为 2.5 版本 Optimus。

Previously, Musk stated that Tesla aims to produce 10 million Optimus units annually at its new Texas factory, with production expected to begin in 2027. 此前，马斯克曾表示，特斯拉将在德州新厂定下目标：年产 1000 万台 Optimus，并预计 2027 年投产。

Musk emphasized: "There could be tens of billions of Optimus units in the future, making it one of the largest products in Earth's history." He also pointed out that safety is a core consideration for the project. 马斯克强调：「未来可能会有数百亿台 Optimus，这将成为地球历史上最大的产品之一。」他同时指出，安全性是该项目的核心考量。

item.title: 亚马逊公布新款自研 AI 芯片 Trainium 3
item.guid: 亚马逊公布新款自研-AI-芯片-Trainium-3
item.description:
Recently, AWS CEO Matt Garman officially announced the latest progress of Amazon's self-developed AI chip Trainium series at the re:Invent 2025 event. 日前，亚马逊云科技 CEO Matt Garman 在 re:Invent 2025 活动上，正式公布了亚马逊自研 AI 芯片 Trainium 系列的最新进展。

At the conference, Amazon Trainium 3 UltraServers were officially launched. 会上，Amazon Trainium 3 UltraServers 正式发布。

According to reports, this is AWS's first server equipped with a 3-nanometer AI chip . Compared to Amazon Trainium 2, it not only boasts a 4.4x increase in computing power and a 3.9x increase in memory bandwidth, but also achieves a 5x growth in the number of AI tokens that can be processed per megawatt of computing power. 据介绍， 这是亚马逊云科技首款搭载 3 纳米工艺 AI 芯片的服务器 ，相较 Amazon Trainium 2，不仅计算能力提升 4.4 倍、内存带宽提升 3.9 倍，每兆瓦算力可处理的 AI token 数量更实现了 5 倍增长。

The server's highest configuration includes 144 chips, providing an astonishing 362 petaflops of FP8 computing power. When running OpenAI's GPT-OSS-120B model, the number of tokens output per megawatt is more than 5 times that of Amazon Trainium 2, achieving an ultra-high energy efficiency ratio. 服务器最高配置 144 个芯片，提供惊人的 362 petaflops FP8 计算能力。在运行 OpenAI 的 GPT-OSS-120B 模型时，每兆瓦输出 token 数是 Amazon Trainium 2 的 5 倍以上，实现超高能耗比。

Meanwhile, Matt Garman also unveiled the Amazon Trainium 4 chip for the first time , promising six times the FP4 computing performance, four times the memory bandwidth, and twice the high memory capacity compared to Amazon Trainium 3. 同时， Matt Garman 还首次披露了 Amazon Trainium 4 芯片 ，并承诺将实现较 Amazon Trainium 3 六倍的 FP4 计算性能、四倍内存带宽和两倍高内存容量。

It is reported that AWS has currently completed the large-scale deployment of over 1 million Trainium 2 chips, providing core computing power support for most inference workloads in Amazon Bedrock, including the efficient operation of Claude's latest generation models. 据悉，亚马逊云科技目前已完成超 100 万个 Trainium 2 芯片的规模化部署，为 Amazon Bedrock 中大部分推理工作提供核心算力支持，包括 Claude 最新一代模型的高效运行。

item.title: 捷豹路虎设计老将遭解雇
item.guid: 捷豹路虎设计老将遭解雇
item.description:
According to AutoCar, Jaguar Land Rover dismissed design director Gerry McGovern on Monday, immediately terminating his position. 据 AutoCar 报道，捷豹路虎于周一解雇了设计总监 Gerry McGovern，并随即终止了后者的职位。

Regarding the above situation, a Jaguar Land Rover spokesperson responded with "no comment," while parent company Tata Motors also did not provide a relevant response. 对于上述情况，捷豹路虎发言人回应称「无可奉告」，同时母公司塔塔汽车也未做出相关回应。

The report points out that the incident occurred just one week after the new CEO, former Tata Motors CFO PB Balaji, took over from Adrian Mardell, and it is widely believed that the Tata Group is strengthening its control. 报道指出，该事件发生在新任 CEO、原塔塔汽车财务负责人 PB Balaji 刚接替 Adrian Mardell 上任一周之后，而外界普遍都认为塔塔集团正在加强对其的控制力。

It is understood that McGovern was one of Jaguar Land Rover's most influential executives and highly valued by former Tata Group chairman Ratan Tata. During his 21 years at Jaguar Land Rover, he left behind numerous works: leading the design of the new Defender, maintaining the sales success of the Range Rover family, and being responsible for the design direction of Jaguar's pure electric brand transformation. 据悉，McGovern 是捷豹路虎最具影响力的高管之一，并且深受塔塔集团前主席 Ratan Tata 的器重。其在捷豹路虎工作的 21 年间，留下了较多的作品：主导新款卫士的设计、保持揽胜家族的热销、负责捷豹纯电品牌转型的设计方向。

item.title: 阿里千问参加美国高考，分数超过 ChatGPT
item.guid: 阿里千问参加美国高考，分数超过-ChatGPT
item.description:
December 3rd news: Alibaba's Qwen has achieved breakthrough results in various high-difficulty exams and competitions globally. 12 月 3 日消息，阿里千问在全球多类高难度考试与竞赛中取得突破性成绩。

Among them, in the SAT exam, known as the "gold standard" for US university admissions, Qwen scored a high 1580, surpassing 99% of global test-takers and models like ChatGPT, reaching the admission level of top institutions such as Harvard, Stanford, and MIT. 其中，被誉为美国大学入学「金标准」的 SAT 考试中，千问以 1580 的高分超过了全球 99% 的考生和 ChatGPT 等模型，成绩达到哈佛、斯坦福、麻省理工等顶尖学府的录取水平。

On the same day, the Qwen APP received a major upgrade for learning scenarios, introducing "photo-based Q&A" and "homework correction," directly embedding its problem-solving capabilities into conversations. When explaining problems, Qwen simulates a human teacher's teaching approach, meticulously breaking down knowledge points and exam points, clearly presenting each step of the solution process. 同日，千问 APP 面向学习场景重磅升级了「拍题答疑」和「作业批改」，将同源的解题能力直接内置到对话中。在讲解题目时，千问会模拟人类老师的教学思路，将知识点和考点进行细致拆解，清晰呈现每一步的解题过程。

It is reported that for homework correction, Qwen can not only grade entire pages of homework but also generate structured smart summaries and provide in-depth explanations for incorrect problems. 据悉，在作业批改上，千问不仅可以批改整页作业，还能生成结构化的智能小结，针对错题给出深度讲解。

item.title: 💡 《阿凡达》导演：对 AI 没意见，但要尊敬演员们
item.guid: 💡-《阿凡达》导演：对-AI-没意见，但要尊敬演员们
item.description:
Recently, director James Cameron stated at the world premiere of "Avatar 3" that the film did not use AI generation, and he subsequently shared his views on the application of generative AI with ComicBook.com. 近日，导演詹姆斯·卡梅隆在《阿凡达 3》世界首映礼上称该片没有使用 AI 生成，随后他对 ComicBook.com 发表了自己对于生成式 AI 的应用看法。

Cameron said that he has no objection to generative AI , but he emphasized: "We don't use it to make 'Avatar' movies. We respect and celebrate actors; we don't replace them with AI. " 卡梅隆表示， 自己对生成式 AI 没有意见 ，但他强调：「我们拍《阿凡达》电影不使用它， 我们尊敬并赞颂演员们，我们不用 AI 代替演员。 」

At the same time, Cameron also said, "This matter (generative AI) will find its own direction. I think Hollywood will self-regulate, but as artists, we need to find a way out, provided we can exist. So, more than anything else, the existential threat from 'Big AI' is what worries me the most." 同时，卡梅隆也表示，「这件事（生成式 AI）自会有方向，我想好莱坞会进行自我监管，但我们作为艺术家要找到出路，前提是我们得能存在。所以，比起别的东西，来自『大 AI』的生存威胁是最让我担忧的。」

It is worth mentioning that the "Big AI" Cameron referred to means the situation of human use of AI and the problems it generates, while the corresponding "Small AI" refers to more detailed, technical aspects, such as using AI to generate content. 值得一提的是，卡梅隆所提到的「大 AI」，是指人类利用 AI 的状况和其产生的问题，对应的「小 AI」是指更细节、技术性的层面，比如用 AI 生成内容。

In Cameron's view, AI and the future of humanity face deep concerns and an existential crisis . He believes that various industries will find ways to deal with and utilize "Small AI," but the issues with "Big AI" are harder to predict. 在卡梅隆看来， AI 和人类未来有深切的担忧和存在危机 ，他认为「小 AI」各行业会找到应对和利用之法，但「大 AI」问题就不好说了。

Cameron also mentioned that if you understand AI, you'll know that "calibration" is a major issue. "AI must be trained, taught, and constrained to do only things that are good for humanity." He emphasized, "Only when we humans reach a consensus can you calibrate AI." 卡梅隆还提到，若了解 AI，就会知道「校准」是个重大问题。「AI 必须被训练、教导，必须被约束去只做对人类好的事情。」其强调，「只有我们人类达成了共识，你才能对 AI 进行校准。」

item.title: iPhone 17e 或保留「刘海」，但边框更窄
item.guid: iPhone-17e-或保留「刘海」，但边框更窄
item.description:
According to MacRumors and The Elec, the iPhone 17e, which may be launched next year, will retain the notch OLED panel of its predecessor, the 16e (the same as the iPhone 14), but is expected to further narrow its bezels. 据 MacRumors 和 The Elec 报道，或明年推出的 iPhone 17e 虽保留前代 16e 的刘海 OLED 面板（即 iPhone 14 同款），但有望进一步收窄边框。

The report mentioned that BOE will be responsible for most of the production of the iPhone 17e's display panel, while Samsung and LG will handle the remaining parts. 报道提到，iPhone 17e 屏幕面板将由京东方负责大部分生产，而三星、LG 负责剩余部分。

It is reported that there were previous leaks claiming the iPhone 17e might feature Dynamic Island and an A19 processor. However, MacRumors believes that narrower bezels are more credible than the Dynamic Island rumors, mainly because reducing bezels is easier without changing the panel itself. 据悉，此前曾有爆料称 iPhone 17e 或配备灵动岛以及 A19 处理器。但 MacRumors 认为，更窄的边框可能比灵动岛传言更加可信，主要原因是在不改变面板本身的情况下，缩小边框更加容易。

item.title: 2 纳米制程，三星预热 Exynos 2600 芯片
item.guid: 2-纳米制程，三星预热-Exynos-2600-芯片
item.description:
Recently, Samsung officially unveiled its next-generation flagship mobile chip, the Exynos 2600, which is expected to be featured in the new Galaxy S26 series phones (possibly launching in early 2026). 日前，三星正式公布了其下一代手机旗舰芯片 Exynos 2600，并预计将搭载于 Galaxy S26 系列新机（或于 2026 年初发布）。

It is reported that the Exynos 2600 will be built using Samsung Foundry's 2-nanometer process technology, making it the world's first 2-nanometer process chip. 据悉，Exynos 2600 将采用三星晶圆代工（Samsung Foundry）的 2 纳米制程工艺打造，同时这也是全球首款 2 纳米制程芯片。

Samsung stated that the Exynos 2600 is touted as a "core-refined" and "fully optimized" product, promising excellent performance. 三星方面表示，号称 Exynos 2600 是一款「核心精炼」「全层级优化」的产品，并且将会有卓越的性能表现。

item.title: 国内首款 AI 助盲眼镜登场
item.guid: 国内首款-AI-助盲眼镜登场
item.description:
On International Day of Persons with Disabilities (December 3), Hangzhou Tongxing Technology Co., Ltd. officially released China's first AI-powered assistive glasses for the blind. 在国际残疾人日（12 月 3 日）这一天，杭州瞳行科技公司正式发布国内首款 AI 助盲眼镜。

According to reports, these glasses are built based on models like Tongyi Qianwen Qwen-VL and OCR, offering features such as obstacle avoidance for travel, object recognition for reading, voice assistant, and one-click help from friends and family. In travel scenarios, the glasses can achieve an ultra-low latency of 300ms, meaning they can provide road guidance with every step taken. 据介绍，该眼镜基于通义千问 Qwen-VL、OCR 等系列模型打造，具有出行避障、找物读物、语音助手和一键求助亲友等功能。在出行场景，该眼镜可实现 300ms 的超低延迟，相当于每迈出一步，眼镜即可给出道路提示。

The official statement indicates that to address the "difficulty in travel" issue for visually impaired individuals, Tongxing will combine its self-developed visual model with Tongyi Qianwen, along with hardware such as a 121-degree ultra-wide-angle dual camera, focusing on creating low-latency obstacle avoidance capabilities and optimizing the model for different scenarios. 官方表示，为解决视障小伙伴的「出行难」问题，瞳行将自研视觉模型与通义千问结合，配合 121 度超广角双摄像头等硬件，着重打造低延时避障能力，并根据不同场景对模型进行针对性调优。

The glasses consist of four parts: the main body of the glasses, a mobile phone, a remote control ring, and a white cane, and are now officially available on the market. 该眼镜由眼镜主体、手机、遥控指环、盲杖四部分组成，目前已正式面市。

item.title: 豆包生图模型 Seedream 4.5 发布
item.guid: 豆包生图模型-Seedream-4.5-发布
item.description:
Generated by Seedream 4.5

On December 3rd, Volcanic Engine officially released the Doubao Image Creation Model Doubao-Seedream-4.5 (referred to as Seedream 4.5), which is now available for public beta testing. 12 月 3 日，火山引擎正式发布豆包图像创作模型 Doubao-Seedream-4.5（简称 Seedream 4.5），现面向用户开启公测。

According to the official introduction, the new generation model has iterated in terms of subject consistency, instruction following accuracy, spatial logic understanding, and aesthetic expression, further improving the overall quality and stability of image generation. 官方介绍，新一代模型在主体一致性、指令遵循精准度、空间逻辑理解及美学表现力等方面实现迭代，进一步提升了图像生成的整体质量与稳定性。

This upgrade also focused on strengthening multi-image combination generation capabilities, ensuring naturalness and consistency when integrating multi-source materials; simultaneously, it optimized poster layout and logo design functions, supporting high-precision text-image mixing, making advertising material generation simpler and more efficient. 此次升级重点还强化了多图组合生成能力，确保多源素材融合时的自然感与一致性；同时优化了海报排版与 Logo 设计功能，支持高精度图文混排，广告物料生成更简单高效。

Currently, Seedream 4.5 fully supports core scenario applications such as advertising and marketing, e-commerce operations, film and television production, digital entertainment, and education. 目前，Seedream 4.5 已全面支持广告营销、电商运营、影视制作、数字娱乐及教育等核心场景应用。

item.title: 可灵首个音画同出模型上线
item.guid: 可灵首个音画同出模型上线
item.description:
Yesterday, Keling officially announced the launch of its first video model that generates both audio and video simultaneously — Keling 2.6. 昨天，可灵正式宣布，其首个音画同出的视频模型模型——可灵 2.6 正式上线。

The official statement indicates that Keling 2.6 achieves simultaneous output of "visuals + natural speech + matching sound effects + environmental atmosphere" in a single generation. 官方表示，可灵 2.6 实现单次生成同时产出「画面 + 自然语音 + 匹配音效 + 环境氛围」。

According to the introduction, Keling 2.6 offers two efficient creation paths: text-to-audio-visual — from a single sentence to a complete audio-visual piece; and image-to-audio-visual — making static images speak and move. 据介绍，可灵 2.6 提供两条高效创作路径：文生音画——从一句话到一条完整音视频；图生音画——让静态画面开口说话、动起来。

Currently, Keling 2.6 is available on the Keling APP or official website. 目前，可灵 2.6 已上线可灵 APP 或官网。

item.title: 《我的世界》将以年份命名版本
item.guid: 《我的世界》将以年份命名版本
item.description:
Recently, "Minecraft" announced that in the future, version numbers will be named by year, and this naming convention will be unified across both Bedrock and Java editions. 日前，《我的世界》（Minecraft）发文宣布，未来将会以年份命名版本号，并且基岩版和 Java 版均统一该命名规定。

Taking game updates launched in 2025 as an example, "Revitalization" will be named with version numbers 25.10 (Bedrock Edition) and 25.1 (Java Edition). For versions updated in 2026, "26" will be used as the version number. 以 2025 年推出的游戏更新为例，如《焕发生机》则以 25.10（基岩版）和 25.1（Java 版）命名版本号。而在 2026 年更新的版本中，将会以「26」为版本号进行更新。

The official statement indicates that this update is to showcase a new game update strategy. At the same time, this version number update will not significantly impact players and will help more creator partners distinguish between updated game version numbers. 官方表示，本次更新是为了展现新的游戏更新策略。同时，本次版本号更新并不会对玩家产生重大影响，并帮助更多创作者伙伴分清更新的游戏版本号。

item.title: 12306 回应「取消靠窗选座」
item.guid: 12306-回应「取消靠窗选座」
item.description:
Recently, some netizens posted that when selecting seats on 12306, they found that the character "窗" (window) on both sides of seats A and F was gone, replaced by "两堵墙" (two walls). 近日，有网友发帖称，在 12306 购票选座时发现，A、F 座两侧的「窗」字没了，而是变为「两堵墙」。

According to a report by Yicai, 12306 customer service staff responded that the seat selection interface for ticket purchases has recently been optimized and adjusted. The sides of seats A and F are not "walls," but rather the character "窗" (window) has been changed to a vertical line. 据第一财经报道，12306 客服工作人员回应表示，最近对于购票选座界面进行了优化调整，A、F 座两侧并不是「墙」，而是将「窗」字改为一道竖线。

Seats A and F are still window-side seats, but they may not be directly facing a window; they could be in front of or behind a window. The interface optimization is to avoid misunderstandings caused by whether a seat is truly window-side. 而 A、F 座依然是靠窗侧的座位，只是不一定正对窗，可能在窗户前或窗户后，界面优化是为了避免因座位是否靠窗引起的误解。

Previously, some netizens reported that after purchasing a window seat ticket for a high-speed train, they found it to be a "wall-facing seat" without a window upon boarding. They suggested that railway departments refine seat markings to facilitate consumer choice. 此前有网友曾反映，其购买的高铁靠窗票，上车后却发现是没有窗户的「面壁座」，建议铁路部门细化座位标识，以便消费者选择。

item.title: Apple Music 上线年度回顾
item.guid: Apple-Music-上线年度回顾
item.description:
Recently, Apple Music officially launched its annual year-in-review listening activity. 日前，Apple Music 正式开启了一年一度的年度听歌回顾活动。

This year's annual review still includes content such as "annual cumulative listening time," "user's top songs/albums of the year," and "most listened artists each month." Notably, this year supports "image export and sharing" for each section, as well as analysis of user listening habits, allowing users to recall if they had the same top artists/albums this year as in previous years. 今年的年度回顾依然拥有「年度听歌累计时长」「用户年度歌曲/专辑」「每月收听最多歌手」等内容。值得一提的是，今年支持各单元「图片导出分享」以及用户听歌习惯分析，能够回忆今年是否与前几年拥有同样的年度歌手/专辑。

🎤 Hey everyone, how long did you listen in 2025, and who was your artist of the year? 🎤 小伙伴们，你们 2025 年听了多长时间，年度歌手又是谁呢？

item.title: 苹果发布国际残疾人日短片
item.guid: 苹果发布国际残疾人日短片
item.description:
Yesterday (December 3rd, International Day of Persons with Disabilities), Apple released an accessibility-themed promotional video titled "Designed for Every Student," featuring disabled university students from around the world. 昨天（12 月 3 日国际残疾人日），苹果发布了一条无障碍主题宣传片《Designed for Every Student》，并且把镜头交给了来自世界各地的残障大学生。

The entire short film's vibe strongly resembles "Glee": cheerful, bright, and full of youthful exuberance. The protagonists sing and dance, their faces full of confidence and energy. The lyrics repeatedly emphasize that we are all the same, ordinary, and equally wonderful. 整条短片的气质像极了《欢乐合唱团》：欢快、明亮、青春张扬。主角们唱着、跳着，镜头里满是自信与能量。歌词则反复强调，我们都一样，普通，也同样精彩。

The short film also introduced several of Apple's accessibility features, refined over many years, such as Magnifier, Braille Access, Live Captions, and Sound Recognition. 短片还介绍了苹果多项打磨多年的无障碍功能，如放大器、盲文访问、实时字幕、环境声检测等功能。

This short film, brimming with youthful passion, also subtly breaks down external prejudices against people with disabilities: 这个洋溢着青春激情的短片，也轻巧地打破了外界对障碍人士的偏见：

Who says that having physical or sensory differences means one cannot have a wonderful university life? Or cannot express themselves through song and dance? 谁规定身体或感官有所差异，就不能度过美好的大学生涯？就不能用歌舞的方式表达自己？

item.title: 郭涛：电影人不要抱怨，要以内容为王
item.guid: 郭涛：电影人不要抱怨，要以内容为王
item.description:
According to Sina Film, at the recent Golden Coconut Award International Jury meeting of the 7th "Hainan Island International Film Festival," actor Guo Tao stated, "Filmmakers should not complain; content is king." 据新浪电影消息，日前在第七届「海南岛国际电影节」金椰奖国际评委见面会上，演员郭涛表示「电影人不要抱怨，要以内容为王」。

Guo Tao stated that he has been working in the industry for 30 years, constantly seeking a balance between artistic expression and market demands. Therefore, he believes filmmakers should not complain or look for objective reasons. "The current film market requires filmmakers to persevere; content is king. We still need to start with the story, and focus more on releasing and expressing from the film itself. This is very important." 郭涛表示，自己从业 30 年，一直在表达和市场之间寻找平衡，因此他认为电影人不要抱怨，找客观原因，「现在的电影市场需要电影人去坚守，内容为王，还是要从故事入手，更多从电影本身去释放，去表达，这是非常重要的。」

He also noted that while commercial blockbusters achieve high box office, they might lack artistic merit, whereas personalized expressions often lack box office support. "Finding a balance between the two is what I pursue and enjoy." 同时其也表示，商业大片有很多票房，但在艺术性上可能有欠缺，但个性化表达又缺乏票房支撑，「如果能在两者之间找到平衡，是我所追求和喜欢的。」

item.title: 动作惊悚片《庇护所》发布预告
item.guid: 动作惊悚片《庇护所》发布预告
item.description:
Recently, the action thriller "Shelter" released its trailer. 日前，动作惊悚片《庇护所》（Shelter）发布预告。

The film tells the story of a mysterious man living in seclusion on a remote Scottish island. One day, he rescues a girl who drifts ashore from a storm, triggering a series of dangerous events. Ultimately, his home is attacked, forcing him to confront his chaotic past. 该片讲述一个神秘男人隐居在苏格兰的一座偏僻小岛上，某天他从风暴中的海上救起一个漂流到此的女孩，引发一系列危险事件，最终他的家也遭到袭击，迫使他不得不面对自己混乱的过去。

The film, directed by Ric Roman Waugh, written by Ward Parry, and starring Jason Statham, Bill Nighy, and others, is set to be released in North America on January 30, 2026. 影片由里克·罗曼·沃夫执导，沃德·帕里编剧，杰森·斯坦森、比尔·奈伊等主演的电影，将于 2026 年 1 月 30 日北美上映。
